movies.title: Squeal
movies.plot: When band members are stranded on a country road, excitement of their first tour is diminished by the horrors of a science experiment gone awry. Their pig-human hybrid mutant captors have many horrors in store but true revulsion does not descend until daylight when the extent of their work is revealed.
movies.simplePlot: When band members are stranded on a country road, excitement of their first tour is diminished by the horrors of a science experiment gone awry. Their pig-human hybrid mutant captors have ...

biography.bio: Allison Batty is an actress, known for Squeal (2008) and All We Know of Heaven (2004).
biography.name: Allison Batty

biography.bio: Kevin Oestenstad is a Los Angeles-based, stage-trained actor with credits in film and TV including Dick Wolf's Chicago P.D. and the CBS drama, CSI:Cyber. He sold his first screenplay with co-writer and loved friend Joe Burke in February 2013. Oestenstad, who is represented by ESA and Crimson Media Group, wrote, directed, and starred in the five minute Western, Made Bed alongside his father and best friends.
biography.name: Kevin Oestenstad

biography.bio: Stephen Dean is an actor, known for Squeal (2008), An Exercise in Vigilance (2007) and Out of the Heart (2016).
biography.name: Stephen Dean

biography.bio: Joe Burke is an actor and filmmaker known for Four Dogs, Dependent's Day, House Sitting, and more. He has appeared in many commercials and television shows, as well as acted alongside Jon Voight on the critically acclaimed Showtime show Ray Donovan. Burke is originally from Toledo, Ohio. After high school, he moved to Chicago, where he studied filmmaking and theater at Columbia College Chicago. In 2007, Burke moved to Los Angeles, where he continued his filmmaking studies and earned his MFA in Directing from the world-renowned American Film Institute in 2009. Burke lives in Los Angeles.
biography.name: Joe Burke

biography.bio: Kelly Jean Badgley is an actress, known for Squeal (2008), Between Shifts (2016) and Lightning Returns: Final Fantasy XIII (2013).
biography.name: Kelly Jean Badgley

biography.bio: Esther Claire was born as Esther Claire Windebank. She is an actress, known for The Truth About Average Guys (2009), Squeal (2008) and The Merry Gentleman (2008).
biography.name: Esther Claire

biography.bio: Gary Murphy was born as Gary Mighell. He is an actor, known for Frogmen Operation Stormbringer (2002), Philco (2010) and Squeal (2008).
biography.name: Gary Murphy

biography.bio: John LaFlamboy is a producer and actor, known for The Moleman of Belmont Avenue (2013), Squeal (2008) and Starving Artist Beatdown (2014).
biography.name: John LaFlamboy
